description.value:
The carved night hag's hand at the end of this sandalwood staff clutches a rough gem. The Staff of the Dreamlands makes it easier to navigate and survive in the Dreamlands and recognize its denizens. When wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Survival checks while in the Dreamlands and to checks to Recall Knowledge about creatures with the dream trait.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4gBIw4IDrSfFHik4]{Daze}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rerNA6YZsdxuJYt3]{Déjà Vu}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.L0GoJpHxSD0wRY5k]{Phantasmal Treasure}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{Silence}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.yM3KTTSAIHhyuP14]{Dream Message}
  • 4th dream message, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Uqj344bezBq3ESdq]{Nightmare}, sleep
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.y0Vy7iNL3ET8K00C]{Dreaming Potential}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene}
  • 6th illusory scene
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.0873MWM0qKDDv81O]{Project Image}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.jBGAYmR0BkkbpJvG]{Visions of Danger}
  • 8th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rwCh2qTYPA44KEoK]{Dream Council}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Oj1PJBMQD9vuwCv7]{Maze}, visions of danger

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
